splot.services.extensions.fundp.handlers
Class ShowWorkflowListHandler

java.lang.Object
  splot.core.Handler
      splot.core.FreeMarkerHandler
          splot.services.extensions.fundp.handlers.ShowWorkflowListHandler

public class ShowWorkflowListHandler
extends FreeMarkerHandler

ShowWorkflowListHandler shows the selected workflow specification's information and tasks list to the user.

Version:
0.1
Author:
PReCISE (research center of the University of FUNDP)

Method Detail

buildModel

public void buildModel(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                       java.util.Map templateModel)
                throws HandlerExecutionException
buildModel implements the handler's logic. It basically fills the templateModel map with the necessary information that will be later referenced by this handler's freemarker template.

Specified by:
buildModel in class FreeMarkerHandler
Parameters:
request - a HttpServletRequest object containing the request received by handler from the client
response - a HttpServletResponse object containing the response should be sent to the client
templateModel - a template including the information's structure should be sent to the client
Throws:
HandlerExecutionException - if an exception has occurred that interferes with the handler's normal operation
